error_details.explanation: Incomplete calculation. The number of tulips (40) was omitted from the operation.

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 125
There are 25+35=<<25+35=60>>60 flowers total.
There are 40+35=<<40+35=75>>75 flowers that are not roses.
Therefore, (75/60)*100=<<(75/60)*100=125>>125% of the flowers are not roses.
